alluxio.security.authentication

Class PlainSaslTransportProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.security.authentication.PlainSaslTransportProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransportProvider

    @ThreadSafe
public final class PlainSaslTransportProvider
extends Object
implements TransportProvider
    If authentication type is AuthType.SIMPLE or AuthType.CUSTOM, this is the default transport provider which uses SASL transport.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientTransport

        public org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport getClientTransport(InetSocketAddress serverAddress)
                                                          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: TransportProvider
        Creates a transport per the connection options. Supported transport options are: AuthType.NOSASL, AuthType.SIMPLE, {link@ AuthType#CUSTOM}, AuthType.KERBEROS. With NOSASL as input, an unmodified TTransport is returned; with SIMPLE/CUSTOM as input, a PlainClientTransport is returned; KERBEROS is not supported currently. If the auth type is not supported or recognized, an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        getClientTransport in interface TransportProvider
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - the server address which clients will connect to
        Returns:
        a TTransport for client
        Throws:
        IOException - if building a TransportFactory fails or user login fails

      • getClientTransport

        public org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport getClientTransport(String username,
                                                                 String password,
                                                                 InetSocketAddress serverAddress)
                                                          throws SaslException
        Gets a PLAIN mechanism transport for client side.
        Parameters:
        username - User Name of PlainClient
        password - Password of PlainClient
        serverAddress - Address of the server
        Returns:
        Wrapped transport with PLAIN mechanism
        Throws:
        SaslException - if an AuthenticationProvider is not found

      • getServerTransportFactory

        public org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportFactory getServerTransportFactory()
                                                                        throws SaslException
        Description copied from interface: TransportProvider
        For server side, this method returns a TTransportFactory based on the auth type. It is used as one argument to build a Thrift TServer. If the auth type is not supported or recognized, an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        getServerTransportFactory in interface TransportProvider
        Returns:
        a corresponding TTransportFactory
        Throws:
        SaslException - if building a TransportFactory fails
